idea-plugin.name: Drawable Importer
idea-plugin.description:
Android Drawable Importer

A simple and efficient tool for importing Android drawable resources into your project.

Features

  • Batch Import: Import multiple density drawable resources at once from a ZIP file
  • Drag & Drop: Simply drag and drop your ZIP file containing drawable resources
  • Preview: Preview images before importing
  • Conflict Detection: Automatically detect and handle file conflicts
  • Rename Support: Rename single image during import
  • Flexible Target: Choose between drawable or mipmap directories

Usage

  1. Open the "Drawable Importer" tool window from the right sidebar
  2. Select your project's res directory
  3. Prepare a ZIP file with the following structure:
    • drawable-mdpi/icon.png
    • drawable-hdpi/icon.png
    • drawable-xhdpi/icon.png
    • drawable-xxhdpi/icon.png
    • drawable-xxxhdpi/icon.png
  4. Drag the ZIP file to the tool window
  5. Preview the images and click "Import"

Android Drawable 导入工具

一个简单高效的 Android drawable 资源导入工具。

功能特性

  • 批量导入：一次性导入多密度 drawable 资源
  • 拖拽操作：直接拖拽 ZIP 文件到工具窗口
  • 图片预览：导入前预览所有图片
  • 冲突检测：自动检测文件冲突并提供覆盖确认
  • 重命名支持：单图片导入时支持重命名
  • 灵活目标：可选择导入到 drawable 或 mipmap 目录

使用方法

  1. 在右侧边栏打开 "Drawable Importer" 工具窗口
  2. 选择项目的 res 目录
  3. 准备包含以下结构的 ZIP 文件：drawable-mdpi/icon.png, drawable-hdpi/icon.png 等
  4. 拖拽 ZIP 文件到工具窗口
  5. 预览图片并点击"导入"按钮
